message: Let's be fair, I'll take the lion's share this time, but I'll make sure you get a decent cut.
Alice, your offer was tempting, but let's be realistic. I'm proposing a more balanced split that reflects the potential future gains if you turn this offer down.  Think carefully!
Okay, I see you want a bigger piece of the pie. Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to drop my share a bit, but you need to be willing to compromise too.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We're losing money with every passing round.  Let's end this now with a perfectly fair 50/50 split.  Take it or leave it, but the deal won't get any better!
